We are going to be aggressive and that's gotta be your default mode.
The good deals that you think are gonna come to you in the world?
They're not gonna come knocking on your door.
You gotta go out and make them happen.
You've gotta innovate and adapt all the time.
The battlefield is always changing.
It'll only stop if you stop.
And I think that's when it's hardest to innovate and adapt is when things are going well.
And when you stop, the enemy's gonna get ahead of you and you're gonna lose.
Most underperformers don't need to be fired and be led.
The real accountability has to get a look at it yourself.
When you're in that moment, when you think, okay, the pressure is off.
Whether it's in your business or whether it's in your life,
when you have that pause that you think everything is okay,
it's not. The enemy is actually maneuvering on you.
When plans get too complex, people can't understand them and things go wrong.
So you gotta keep things simple.
We are all in conflict.
And if we recognize that we're in conflict, we can also recognize that there's a winner and a loser.
The way that you train, the way that you plan, the way you prepare,
and most importantly, the way that you lead is going to dictate the outcome.
If you don't work together as a team, we're gonna get killed.
When you find something you want to make it happen, make it happen!
